newsitem.title: FRANCE: France sells 405 mln Ecu OATs at auction.
newsitem.headline: France sells 405 mln Ecu OATs at auction.

text.p: The Treasury sold the following Ecu-denominated government bonds (OATs) at auction on Thursday.
MATURITY COUPON SALE AMOUNT AVERAGE YIELD
BID AMT/COVER NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE
PCT ALLOTED AT LOWEST PRICE* PAYMENT DATE
* PRICES ABOVE GOT ALLOTMENTS IN FULL NEXT OFFER
MATURITY COUPON SALE AMOUNT AVERAGE YIELD
BID AMT/COVER NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE
PCT ALLOTED AT LOWEST PRICE* PAYMENT DATE
* PRICES ABOVE GOT ALLOTMENTS IN FULL NEXT AUCTION
NOTE - The Treasury originally announced it would sell 300 to 500 million Ecus of OATs in total today. The total bid cover ratio of the auction was 3.8.
